Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說是一片漆黑，……可我竟完全無法理解，此刻，這房間中所發生之事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说是一片漆黑，……可我竟完全无法理解，此刻，这房间中所发生之事。

Umineko Project (UP): ......What was that shuffling sound just now? I, I'm not sure... I can't explain it.
Steam (ST): ...What was that shuffling sound just now? I-I'm not sure... I can't explain it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……今、部屋の中で、ばさばさばさって、何？　よ、よくわからない、うまく説明できない。
Russian (RU): ......Что это было за шарканье? Н‐не знаю точно... Не могу объяснить.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O que foi esse barulho de agora a pouco? E‐Eu não sei... Não consigo explicar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……此刻，在這房間中，啪沙啪沙啪沙的是什麼？搞、搞不懂，講不清。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……此刻，在这房间中，啪沙啪沙啪沙的是什么？搞、搞不懂，讲不清。

Umineko Project (UP): It was a loud sound like someone crawling out of bed.
Steam (ST): I heard an incredible slithering sound, like someone crawling out of a bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was an incredible slithering sound of someone crawling out of a bed.
PC Japanese (JP): まるで布団の中から、誰かが這い出すようなすごい音がした。
Russian (RU): Кто‐то громко выскочил из постели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Foi um som alto, como se alguém estivesse saindo debaixo da cama.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 房中響起的是，宛如某人從被窩中爬出來的駭人之聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 房中响起的是，宛如某人从被窝中爬出来的骇人之声。

Umineko Project (UP): I wouldn't say something as non‐committal as I "felt like" I heard it. I wouldn't say something as vague as I "sensed a presence". I definitely heard it, right next to me, clearly.
Steam (ST): I didn't "think" I'd heard it. It wasn't that vague. I definitely heard it happen, right next to me, clearly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It wasn't 'like' that sort of sound. It wasn't that vague. I definitely heard that, right next to me, clearly.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、気がした、なんて曖昧なものじゃない。気配がしたなんて、いい加減なものじゃない。確かに聞いた、すぐそこでという、はっきり具体的なもの。
Russian (RU): Не 'как будто'. Не так расплывчато. Я ясно слышала это совсем рядом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu não diria imprudente como "eu senti ter ouvido" alguma coisa. Eu não diria algo tão vago como "eu senti uma presença". Eu definitivamente ouvi, bem perto de mim, claramente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這並非“感覺好像是”什麼的，曖昧不清之物。不是“感到有動靜”什麼的，拿不准的玩意。的確是聽到了，就在旁邊，清楚具體。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这并非“感觉好像是”什么的，暧昧不清之物。不是“感到有动静”什么的，拿不准的玩意。的确是听到了，就在旁边，清楚具体。

Umineko Project (UP): However, there was no change to the bed.{n}No one had been sleeping there in the first place, and the sheets were still perfectly straight.
Steam (ST): However, there was no change to the bed. No one had been sleeping there in the first place, and the sheets were still perfectly straight.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, there was no change to the bed. No one had been sleeping there in the first place, and the sheets were still perfectly straight.
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、ベッドは何事もない。元々、誰も寝ていないし、乱れようもない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、ベッドは何事もない。{n}元々、誰も寝ていないし、乱れようもない。
Russian (RU): Но на кровати ничего не изменилось.{n}Во‐первых, там никто не спал, а простыни до сих пор были совершенно прямыми.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas nada tinha mudado na cama.{n}Pra começar, não tinha ninguém dormindo lá, e os lençóis estavam perfeitamente arrumados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而，床上什麼事都沒有。{n}原本就沒睡著人，不可能被搞亂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而，床上什么事都没有。{n}原本就没睡着人，不可能被搞乱。

Umineko Project (UP): Someone had crawled out of the bed, .........and had laughed in a creepy voice before leaving the room...... ............That's......what it felt like.
Steam (ST): Someone had crawled out of the bed... ...and had laughed in a creepy voice before leaving the room... ......That's... ...what it felt like.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Someone had crawled out of the bed, .........and had laughed in a creepy voice before leaving the room...... .........That's......what it felt like.
PC Japanese (JP): 誰かがベッドの布団から這い出して、………気持ち悪い声で笑いながら、部屋を出て行った……。…………ように、……感じた。
Russian (RU): Кто‐то вылез из постели......... и перед тем, как покинуть комнату, жутко засмеялся...... .........Вот...... на что это было похоже.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Alguém rastejou debaixo da cama, .........e riu com uma voz sinistra antes de deixar o quarto...... ............Foi......tipo isso o que eu senti.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我感到了，………有人從床上的被窩裡爬了出來……，…………邊發出噁心的笑聲，……邊從房間出去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我感到了，………有人从床上的被窝里爬了出来……，…………边发出恶心的笑声，……边从房间出去了。

Umineko Project (UP): Felt like? I'm here, and the bed's right there.
Steam (ST): Felt like? I'm here, and the bed's right there.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Felt like? I'm here, and the bed's right there.
PC Japanese (JP): 感じた？　私はここで、ベッドはそこ。
Russian (RU): Похоже? Я здесь, кровать здесь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tipo isso? Eu estou aqui, a cama está ali.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 感到了？我在這，床在那。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 感到了？我在这，床在那。

Umineko Project (UP): I'm not only in the same room, I'm right next to it. ......So, why am I so unsure about what happened just a few seconds ago?!
Steam (ST): I'm not only in the same room, I'm right next to it. ...So, why am I so unsure about what happened just a few seconds ago?!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I'm not only in the same room, I'm right next to it. ......So, why am I so unsure about what happened just a few seconds ago?!
PC Japanese (JP): 同じ部屋どころか、すぐここと、そこの話なのに、……何で私はこんなにも、ほんの数秒前のことがよくわかってないの…？！
Russian (RU): Я в той же комнате, стою рядом с ней. ......Так почему я так не уверена в произошедшем пару секунд назад?!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não estou apenas no mesmo quarto, estou bem do lado. ......Então, por que eu estão tão insegura sobre o que acabou de acontecer?!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 豈止是同一個房間，明明就是靠的很近的這裡那裡的事，……為什麼我會以至這種地步地，連區區幾秒前的事都搞不懂呢…？！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 岂止是同一个房间，明明就是靠的很近的这里那里的事，……为什么我会以至这种地步地，连区区几秒前的事都搞不懂呢…？！

Umineko Project (UP): I gripped the receiver, which had gone completely silent, .........and waited there alone, unable to move, in a quiet room that seemed exactly identical to the one I had first entered...
Steam (ST): I gripped the receiver, which had gone completely silent, ...and waited there alone, unable to move, in a quiet room that seemed exactly identical to the one I'd entered...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I gripped the receiver, which had gone completely silent, ......and waited there alone, unable to move, in a quiet room that seemed exactly identical to the one I had first entered...
PC Japanese (JP): もう何も聞こえない受話器を握り締め、………何も始めから変わらないかのような、静かな室内に、……私はひとり、呆然としている…。
Russian (RU): Я сжала трубку, из которой больше ничего не было слышно. ......Не в состоянии двинуться, я стояла в тихой комнате — точно такой же, какой она была, когда я только вошла...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu agarrei o telefone, que tinha ficado em completo silêncio, .........e esperei sozinha, incapaz de me mover, dentro de um quarto silencioso, exatamente igual ao que eu havia entrado...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 握緊已經聽不到任何聲音的話筒，………在如同從一開始起就什麼都沒改變過的，安靜的室內，……我一個人，呆愣著…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 握紧已经听不到任何声音的话筒，………在如同从一开始起就什么都没改变过的，安静的室内，……我一个人，呆愣着…。
[=CHT]

Umineko Project (UP): If nothing had changed since the beginning, ......I could just pretend that the last minute or so didn't happen.
Steam (ST): If nothing's changed since the beginning, ...I can just pretend that the last minute or so didn't happen.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If nothing's changed since the beginning, ......I can just pretend that the last minute or so didn't happen.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se nada mudou desde o início, ......eu poderia só fingir que o último minuto não existiu.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然從一開始起就什麼都沒改變，……那我也可以把幾十秒前所發生的事，當成沒發生過。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然从一开始起就什么都没改变，……那我也可以把几十秒前所发生的事，当成没发生过。

Umineko Project (UP): However, ......if something had changed, ......that would be proof that something really did happen...
Steam (ST): And yet, ...if something has changed, ...that would prove that something really did happen...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And yet, ......if something has changed, ......that would be proof that something really did happen...
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、………もし変わったことがあったなら、……それは、紛れもなく、何かがあったことになる…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、………もし変わったことがあったなら、……それは、紛れもなく、何かがあったことになる…。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, ......se alguma coisa mudou, ......essa seria uma prova de que algo realmente aconteceu...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，………倘若真有什麼改變了的話，……那這就代表著，毫無疑問，曾發生過什麼…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，………倘若真有什么改变了的话，……那这就代表着，毫无疑问，曾发生过什么…。

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……搞啥啊，……为什么，………不见了啊……？」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quer dizer que a boneca da {f:5:Beatrice}‐sama teria gargalhado e deixado quarto...?
